attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we used to be able to watch lost on freeview. when they switched to sky one we had to get ntl/virgin to watch it. and now you have to pay 50 quid a month plus installation, mini dish etc to watch it. it's complete extortion. i encourage everyone to buy it on dvd/download it and cut out the middle man. tell rupert murdoch where to go.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
